#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    char ch;
     int i,j;int m=t;
            char a[105];
    while((ch=getchar())!=EOF)
    {
          
           
     //  scanf("%[^'\n']s",&a);
            //puts(a);
          i=0;
          
    while(ch!='\n')
  {  a[i++]=ch;ch=getchar();}
    a[i]='\0';
  //  puts(a);
          
            
           
           
            char b[105];
            j=0;
            for(i=0;i<=strlen(a);i++)
            {
                                    if((a[i]==32)||(a[i]==0))
                                    {b[j]='\0';j=0;
                                   // printf("this was the word %s\n",b);
                                    if(strcmp(b,"8")==0)
                                    printf("ate");
                                    else
                                    if(strcmp(b,"w8")==0)
                                    printf("wait");
                                    else
                                    if(strcmp(b,"gr8")==0)
                                    printf("great");
                                    else
                                    if(strcmp(b,"4")==0)
                                    printf("for");
                                    else
                                    if(strcmp(b,"b4")==0)
                                    printf("before");
                                    else
                                    printf("%s",b);
                                    i++;printf(" ");
                                    while(a[i]==32){printf("%c",a[i]);i++;}
                                    i--;
                                    }
                                 else
                                 b[j++]=a[i];
                                 
                                 
                                 
                                    }
                                  
                                    
                                    if(m-t)
                                    printf("\n");
                                      t--;
                                    }
                                    return 0;
                                    }
